campaign.story:
FLUXBAG - The Smarter Air Pump
Ever faced the challenge of inflating anything? How did it go? It's usually a pain, one way or the other, isn’t it? Here's how we can change things for the better:
The FLUXBAG is a revolutionary new kind of air pump that inflates items like pool toys, air mattresses or sleeping pads effortlessly and in an instant. It is practically a "self-inflating air pump": You simply connect it to your inflatable, breath into it JUST ONCE, and then push 100/140L of air effortlessly into your inflatable item. 
The FLUXBAG, in a nutshell, is an air pump without the effort, much faster, smaller and more lightweight than other air pumps, and doubles as a huge XXL dry bag or a comfy beach pillow. 

We successfully launched the FLUXBAG here on Kickstarter back in 2016. Now we are returning with an extensively tried and tested, much more sophisticated and matured product. All connector, adapter, and nozzle parts have been redesigned to make the FLUXBAG compatible with virtually all valves that you'll find with inflatables in the leisure segment. You will also be able to 3D-print your own custom nozzle.  
(1) EFFORTLESS: Inflate items with just ONE breath
You simply blow into the FLUXBAG just once or twice - no wind or running necessary
For many inflatables just ONE breath and the force of gravity is all that it takes to fully inflate them. How on earth can this work? How would you inflate a 100/140L bag with only the 3 liters of air that your lungs can hold? It's smartly applied physics called the Bernoulli Principle: 
Blow into the FLUXBAG once or twice to fill it in just a few seconds ..
The "breathing jet" you create by exhaling into the FLUXBAG somewhat counterintuitively creates a lower air pressure in the bag. The surrounding air is then sucked into the FLUXBAG - you close it quickly and have 100/140 liters available to push into most any inflatable of your liking. It's the same physical effect that makes aircrafts fly.
.. then push 100/140L of air effortlessly into your inflatable
Thus the FLUXBAG does not need any wind, nor do you need to run around with it or hopelessly wave it through the air, unlike those – often highly dysfunctional – inflatable beach sofa loungers.
(2) FASTER: Continuous airflow through optimized nozzles
Unlike conventional manual air pumps, the FLUXBAG creates a powerful continuous airflow that you achieve just by using gravity and your body's weight instead of your muscles or lungs. What's more, our nozzle geometries are optimised for maximum airflow
Compared to a run-of-the-mill battery-powered electric air pump, the FLUXBAG not only performs faster but is also much more portable and uses far fewer resources to manufacture. Someone made a quick one-minute YouTube video running both devices side by side. (Text inserts are in German, but you'll surely get the idea..)  
Another advantage of the FLUXBAG – compared to standard 15-to 20-dollar electric pumps: You can exert a higher air pressure with it and thus FULLY inflate your e.g. pool toy or air bed which then won’t be as "floppy" as if they have been inflated with an electric pump.
A few examples, tested with the new FLUXBAG PRO

(3) SMALLER & LIGHTER: More bang for the gram
The FLUXBAG is literally pocket-sized and weighs less than 150 grams. We achieve this by using very lightweight but highly durable fabrics that you find with other professional outdoor gear. That 150g is only 1/5 the weight of other air pumps.
The FLUXBAG is much lighter - but also a lot smaller than other air pumps
(4) MULTIPLE USES: Doubles as an XXL dry bag or a beach pillow
Also a very large and very lightweight dry bag
It's 3-in-1: Many love the FLUXBAG's double use as a huge dry bag. When backpacking with only a small tent, the FLUXBAG is perfect to store stuff outside. Or use it as a backpack liner for extra water protection, or perhaps as a sturdy, reusable laundry bag. Since it comes with an air-tight lid, just form a triple knot with the roll-up closure's ends to turn it into a pillow, and you can quite comfortably rest your head or back against the FLUXBAG when you want to relax on the beach or on a trekking tour.
Need a pillow on the beach or on a trekking tour? FLUXBAG has you covered.
 A few quick demo videos..

FLUXBAG 3rd Generation: All new features and fittings 
This is the product we always wanted to make. We completely redesigned all the nozzles and connector parts and even added new ones. We optimised geometries, surface coarseness, and the material's elasticity. The silicone coating on the conical nozzles is a world's first. All this allows for significantly higher air pressures. It is like the "Porsche of air pump nozzle sets".
The FLUXBAG now reliably connects with all common valves
You will also be able to 3D-print your own custom nozzle if you like. Scroll down for details.
Any kind or brand of outdoor sleeping pads will fit any FLUXBAG now
The new FLUXBAG 3.0 now perfectly connects with ALL outdoor sleeping pads, regardless of the manufacturer. With a direct flat-valve connection (2 sizes) and our trusted silicone tube adapters (4 flexible tubes) for screw-top valves in all sizes, like e.g. Therm-a-rest, we now have the most versatile and practical solution. 
The new blow-back-protected connector now allows the FLUXBAG to inflate even the largest balloons
We also added a built-in non-return valve into the new FLUXBAGs that prevents the air from flowing back when you apply multiple "fluxes" to inflate larger items such as older air beds or even the largest pool floats. The FLUXBAG is the world's first and only pump sack with that feature.
The new extension trunk makes it a lot easier to connect the FLUXBAG with larger inflatables
We made an extension trunk as a new add-on that improves the FLUXBAG's functionality with hard-to-reach valves that are typically found on large aquatic toys or inflatable boats. While this accessory will sell separately for 10 USD/EUR later, we are tossing it in for FREE with every FLUXBAG pre-ordered here on Kickstarter. 
The new FLUXBAGs come with an illustrated user guide
Finally, there will be a new extensively-illustrated manual that will help you to make the most of your new FLUXBAG. Although the product is very easy to use, it takes a bit of practice to get a hang of it. The new manual will help you to achieve that within minutes.
Please note that the FLUXBAG is only suitable for low to medium air pressure items. The physics unfortunately do not allow for use with high-pressure items such as bicycle tires, SUPs, surf kites or heavy-duty rafts - unless you weigh a metric ton. As a rule of thumb: If you could inflate it with your mouth and lungs or a standard electric pump, you can also do it with a FLUXBAG.
Project timeline and use of funds
We will use the funds we raise from you guys here on Kickstarter to make the rather expensive steel molds for the new plastic parts and weld the new extension trunks. 
All the textile FLUXBAG bodies (the actual "bag" part) have been manufactured already – and they're just great!  
All the textile parts have been manufactured already and are of outstanding quality
Pick your FLUXBAG! What's in the pack?
Top: FLUXBAG PRO (140L, Nylon) Bottom: FLUXBAG FUN (100L, Polyester)
FLUXBAG 3.0 comes in two sizes, and both variations are fitted with the same sets of accessories. When it comes to choosing your FLUXBAG, the major differences are capacity and – to a certain extent – handling:
FLUXBAG PRO specs
The FLUXBAG PRO's 140-liters capacity allows you to quickly inflate even the largest items. Its 60cm-wide opening makes filling it slightly more challenging than with the only 50cm-wide FUN version since the Bernoulli principle will not play quite as easily with the wider opening. That being said, the difference in usability may be no more than 15 minutes of practice. It's made of high quality rip-stop Nylon (PA).
FLUXBAG FUN specs
Our FLUXBAG FUN provides you with 100 liters of air in one go (approx. 30% less than the PRO). You may have to re-flux more to fill the same inflatable. On the other hand, the FUN is easier to handle compared with the PRO since it is only 50cm wide and faster to fill with just one breath. It's made of high quality polyester fabric in the same specifications as the PRO's nylon.
For the Balloons United Edition we added 5 click-on adapter disks to a fully-fledged FLUXBAG PRO
Since the new generation FLUXBAGs come with built-in blow-back-protection, you can use them to inflate balloons of any size now. With our friends at Balloons United – perhaps the world's best and biggest online store for anything balloons – we made a special edition for all the looners among us.
Need any custom parts? 
We have covered all common kinds and sizes of valves in the leisure and outdoor segment. Yet there surely is that special-sized valve where none of the nozzles will fit (well). Also, you may come up with your own idea of what to do and connect with your FLUXBAG –something no one has ever thought of before.. 
To make the FLUXBAG useful even for these special cases, we will provide a 3D file download of the nozzle base as well as the connector thread from our website after the Kickstarter campaign is finished, so you can design and print yourself whatever nozzle, connector – or anything else – you may need.
A thankful note to the backers of our first Kickstarter campaign in 2016
Without you, there would be no FLUXBAG! We so much appreciate your support and trust at a time when we were admittedly quite clueless about what we were getting ourselves into. We had sent you a final backer update a few days ago where we shared some of our experiences from the last two years.
The final screen of our 2016 Kickstarter campaign that made all this possible
In this new campaign we created special rewards that we thought would fit your needs without having to rob the bank: You can just pledge for the new kit. Also, there are attractive limited packages of a new FLUXBAG with an additional kit that will upgrade your old 2016 Kickstarter Edition as well. If you got a multi-pack back then, you will be able to add more new kits for only a little more money when you check out your new reward in Backerkit. We hope that works for everybody!
Looking back: A round trip via German "Shark Tank" – and even Amazon
This all started in early summer 2016 when we came up with the idea and made the first prototypes from polyethylene (PE) tube foil. 
June 2016: Demoing the first prototypes. For some reasons we wanted to lie on the thing back then, LOL
Only a few weeks later, we successfully introduced the FLUXBAG on Kickstarter. We went to China, had the first batch made, and properly shipped these pre-orders in Winter 2017. 
December 2016: Lucas at our first manufacturer in Dongguan
Shortly after that, we found ourselves on the official German version of "Shark Tank" ("Die Höhle der Löwen", literally "The Lions' Den" on German VOX) where we cut a deal with Ralf Dümmel. In the end we decided not to give away any company shares and just licensed the product to our "shark's" company in order to pocket some money from the TV show. Ralf's company made and sold tens of thousands of their licensed FLUXBAGs that used a cheaper and much heavier fabric than we did. To our knowledge, it is therefore already the world's best-selling pump sack.  
March 2017: Filming DHDL/German "Shark Tank" with products from our first Kickstarter campaign
Last summer our own original FLUXBAGs that we had manufactured a year earlier became a bestseller on German Amazon. The product consistently ranked among the top 5 manual air pumps in Amazon.de's "Sports & Outdoor" department.
But frankly, 3.7 stars from reviews on Amazon is below what we set out to achieve. All design and manufacturing happened extremely fast and within a period of just a few months - our 1st and 2nd generation products were very similar and definitely had a few kinks. This revolutionary idea deserves better - and we will deliver!
We listened very carefully to the customer feedback we got, and went back to the drawing board. Now we have completely redesigned and greatly improved everything molded & plastic that came with the Generation 1.0 and 2.0 products and added new nozzles, adapters and an accessory. It may not sound like much, but it makes the FLUXBAG something that is REALLY helpful, practical, and honest.
We are HILFE Industries
Left: Jens –––– Right: Lucas (takes time off)
We founded HILFE Industries in 2016 as a product generator startup in Leipzig, Germany and Hong Kong. For the new generation FLUXBAGs we are working with Henning Seide, a Leipzig-based product designer specialising in 3D for plastic moulding.
Fulfillment & Shipping
We are using Backerkit again to streamline the process for everyone. Backerkit helps keep track of your shipping address even if you are moving. It will also let you add more items to your Kickstarter pledge. 
Your rewards will be shipped with a tracking ID directly from Hong Kong at very favourable international rates.
The FLUXBAG is "customs friendly" - we have not heard from anyone in our first Kickstarter whose shipment was held by customs in order to charge additional fees or taxes. We will pull some strings again to make sure you receive your reward as smoothly.
Photo Credits: Team FLUXBAG at the DHDL TV studio: VOX / Bernd-Michael Maurer /// Team FLUXBAG portrait at the beach: Anne Schwerin /// Some in-situ photo: Jessica Zaydan /// Product studio shots: Sophia Kesting, Franziska Krepp
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
You may consider this a low-risk Kickstarter project for various reasons:

(1) This is a 3rd generation product, we have been doing this for a good two years already. Thousands of customers have used earlier versions, we got a lot of feedback and have worked out kinks in earlier versions.

(2) The textile "bag parts" have been already manufactured and are of outstanding quality. Our QA rejection rate there is significantly below 0.5%.

(3) For the new components, we continue working with our established network of suppliers in China. We know them all, have visited the factories and built mutual trust. Still, we have contracts of course and will employ third-party quality assurance services as we did before. We will be in China when your rewards are assembled and packaged to ensure professional quality standards.

(4) We are a real company established in 2016, not just a couple of guys with a cool idea. To us, Kickstarter is an extremely important platform to introduce future products - so we won't ruin our standing here. Expect something literally bright later this year from HILFE Industries here on KS.

Even so, there are residual risks: If Jens as the project's leader dies in a plane crash, the project is in serious trouble. If our plastic molder's factory in Guangzhou or our fulfillment center in Hong Kong burns down, there will be delays. But frankly, we suggest you trust this. Thanks!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Intermediate: A quick note and call regarding the plastic pilot shipping program
updates.update_content:
Since today's update, the pilot shipping survey has been overwhelmed by new signups. That's great, thanks a lot for your enduring interest! It's open worldwide now.
Many though who signed up recently have not been backers in our timid first 2016 campaign after double-checking. So I find myself puzzled: Why would one need plastic if you possibly haven't got the fabric? There are many explanations for that, and all good of them make sense. May I ask all the non-2016ers (nothing bad about not backing that utterly weird thing back then) to make your own practical use of the new kit more apparent? –– You may easily edit your survey data on Google, the last item. Sorry for the inconvenience. Just want to be fair and create max benefit in a competitive situation. Cheers, Jens

updates.update_userinfo: Update #10 – Hardness solved / Pilot sets are being shipped / Live on AMA DE / On turning Chinese
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
It’s been 3 weeks since my last update and things have made some progress.
Remember, last time an essential part was too hard and the whole product would not work. The molder made 1,500 new parts and fedexed them as swiftly as expensively (his charge). Solved – but read on in the “Chinese bit” below if you like.

updates.update_userinfo: New sets arrived. We have a hardness problem – but (hopefully) solved.
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
Earlier today two huge cartons with 1,500 new nozzle & adapter sets arrived here in Leipzig. Don't they look amazing...

updates.update_userinfo: Update #8: T2 parts work fine. Placed the first order. Limited EU pilot shipping.
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
Things are coming together bit by bit. After being held up by a jam in customs for almost a week, the second iteration of the new parts (i.e. T2) has arrived yesterday. We made them in three different hardnesses so the snap joint connection between the nozzles and the adapter is firm enough to hold when you put pressure on the FLUXBAG – but lose enough to be disassembled without super-human powers in your hands. Also, the connection with those very special, unstandardised Decathlon flat valves was another hardness issue that is now solved.

updates.update_userinfo: Update #7: Molds are working, T1 samples have arrived
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
Four weeks after my last update the three new molds have been milled. The first T1 iteration of all the new parts has been finished in Shenzhen last Friday and arrived here earlier today. That’s one of the good things about living in Leipzig: You have the huge European DHL hub at LEJ airport and Express shipments are even faster.

updates.update_userinfo: Update #6: The new molds have been ordered!
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
Even though I said before that I will only update when there’s relevant news, I should not have let so much time passed since my last update. Sorry for that!
Anyway: Yesterday I eventually ordered the new molds for the new parts, yay!

Hello Backers,
Following my policy to publish updates when there is any news to report, here we go..
Remember: In July I informed you that everything is still alive and kicking again despite the old legal entity’s insolvency filing and my health problems. I was planning to make a new set of plastic nozzles and other parts in China.

Hello Backers,
Finally, things are moving again. Really now. Sorry, for not updating you earlier – but what sense would it have made as long as everything was still in limbo?
Remember: Company insolvency, solo entrepreneur with severe burnout, no money at all... It really took me a while to really (!) recover, and even longer to come up with an elegant solution for new money – but finally, we have arrived there. It’s so much fun to work again and see things progressing!

campaign.story:
CONTENTS
1. WHY MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA ARE GAME CHANGERS 
    HOW CAN THESE TINY LIGHTS BE STRONG 
2. WHICH REWARD FITS YOUR BIKE?  
    MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS - WEGA - MAGNIC NIGHT BIKE- 
    MAGNIC LIGHT TEAM CLOTHING
3. LET ANIMATIONS EXPLAIN FUNCTIONS
    TECHNICAL DATA - BRAKE LIGHT - BEAM ADJUSTMENT -
    BRAKE PAD EXCHANGE - SHIFT MECHANISM - WEGA VISIBILITY
4. HOW CAN YOUR BIKE GLOW AT NIGHT?
    PHOSPHORESCENT WHEELS - PREMIUM - CLASSIC
6. FASCINATING TECHNOLOGY & PHYSICS
7. HOW THE FUTURE CAN BE SMART
8. HOW WE DO POLITICS: GERMAN STVZO
9. WHICH FAMOUS CYCLIST AWARDED MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS?
10. MEDIA COVERAGE  --- FEATURED ON...
11. OUR BACKGROUND
12. ILLEGAL COPIES & PLAGIARISM
13. PAYMENT WITHOUT CREDIT CARD
14. FAQ
15. PHOTO GALLERIES (FREE FOR MEDIA USAGE)
Magnic Microlights in Action
If your web connection is slow, watch the video with additional Eddy Current Explanation + Smart Feature Demonstration with automatic subtitles in 8 languages:
1. WHY MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA ARE GAME CHANGERS
Cyclists can't escape darkness: It returns every evening and sometimes even at daytime when passing tunnels. Battery lights seem comfortable with quick & easy installation but there will be moments when the batteries are empty while you need them most.
With Magnic Microlights you don't have to fear these moments because you have neverending light :

Benefits of Magnic Microlights:
Non Contact : You don't feel or hear them
No batteries - Neverending power
Strong enough to enlight the road ahead
Easy To Install 
Cool "invisible" design: Compact size without adapters
Environmentally Friendly
Works with all bicycle models - WEGA for disc brakes
Don't fear the dark! The best time to cycle is whenever you want.
Magnic Microlights are the world’s smallest non-contact dynamos, that are integrated together with electronics and lighting system in the brake shoes. In 2012 we presented our invention Magnic Light here on Kickstarter. Many "experts" did not believe this principle can work and believed our lights would be a fake but the MAGIC is clever usage of well known eddy current technology. With more than 17.000 Magnic lights on the road via our successful Magnic Light IC campaign 2014 and our webshop we have proved that this sustainable, environment-friendly technology has the power to replace battery lights for bicycles. 
The last 18 months we worked hard on the development of the Micro-Technology. With Magnic Microlights you can add non-contact dynamo light to your bicycle without need of extra adapters. If your bicycle has disc brakes choose Wega which has flexibility in four directions and fits to nearly all other bikes (except Vbrake/Canti systems), too.  
3D Printed material, Fully functional contactless generator & PCB Board electronic.
MAGNIC MICROLIGHT compared to WEGA- THE MICROLIGHT for disc brakes. We named it WEGA because of the similarity with the stellar constellation Lyra and it's brightest star Wega
WEGA might be the most universal bike light on planet earth
HOW CAN THESE TINY LIGHTS BE STRONG?
Beneath generator technology one important aspect is the optimal choice of LED + lens which gives a big advantage compared to normal LED bicycle lights. For the Magnic Microlights we have chosen the newest extreme density - Cree LED (available since summer 2018): The most efficient high power LED with minimum size (1.6 mm x 1.6mm compared to 3.45mm x 3.45mm as used in many LED biycle lights).

What does this mean for Magnic Microlights?

Imagine you have a good bicycle light with 3,45mm x 3,45 mm LED, Lens of size 34,5 mm and 100 Lumen/Watt (These are quite excellent values for biycle lights).  
Magnic Microlights don't have the strongest generators (because cyclists should not feel anything!) but they have the best light efficiency on the market: 200 Lumen/Watt !
With same current and tiny lenses MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS & WEGA have twice the power of large high quality LED/lens applications.
2. WHICH REWARD FITS YOUR BIKE?
See the specification here and preorder on the top right of this page.
MAGNIC LIGHT TEAM CLOTHING
See pictures in the gallery
3. LET ANIMATIONS EXPLAIN FUNCTIONS 
We have tested the current brakeshoe design from May to October on roadbikes & mountainbikes with more than 3000 test kilometers. Although the stability of the prototype material (3d printed PLA) did not match that of the final product, there was no  difference in braking performance compared to standard brakes that we otherwise use in training and everyday cycling.
See more details in the gallery...
TECHNICAL DATA

Our prototypes are less efficient than the final version because of lower generator power. We have to estimate the power of the final product based on the prototypes and our experience from the current Magnic Light version.

BRAKE LIGHT
Magnic Microlights have an effective brake light function. When you pull the brakes the distance between rim and generator decreases resulting in higher generator power and higher light output. The brake light works precisely and is a clear signal for subsequent traffic.
All Magnic Microlights have an integrated "Brake Light"-function shown here: When you pull the brakes the lights brighten up which warns the driver behind you.
BEAM ADJUSTMENT
The design of front-& rearlight allows to adjust the light beam regardless of the fork angle. Even for extreme bicycle frame geometry you can adjust the light beam towards the road.
BRAKE RUBBER REPLACEMENT
Worn brake pads can be exchanged easily as you would expect from standard brakes. 
SHIFT MECHANISM
After longer usage your brakepads will loose up to 5mm material before you have to exchange them. The generator performance stongly depends on the rim distance so we have integrated an automatic shift mechanism to keep the distance between generator and rim constant small. An exchangeable shift-element moves the generator away from the rim and prevents grinding of the generator part.
After longer usage your brakepads will loose up to 5mm material before you have to exchange them. We have integrated an automatic shift mechanism to keep the distance between generator and rim constant which is important for performance of the system.
WEGA VISIBILITY

Wega is visible from both sides
See more details in the gallery...
                                                                                                                         4. HOW CAN YOUR BIKE GLOW AT NIGHT?
When we tried to assemble the "perfect" bicycle for this technology we were fascinated by the combination with phosphorescent wheels and decided to offer the Magnic Night Bike as reward, too.
Here you see the "Glow ion the dark" effect of the Magnic Night Bike wheels.
 These are custom made wheels. In addition to the phosphorescent painting these are high quality welded aluminium rims which you only find on upper class roadbikes (like Shimano or Mavic). Even if "normal" rims work good with all Magnic Lights these rims are welded and don't have a magnetic rim joint. 
 

PREMIUM
The Magnic Night Bike is unique! You won't find something like this in any bike shop! Click on the image to reach the gallery.
   See more details in the gallery...
Four Magnic Microlights enlight the welded “Glow in the dark" rims. To keep your trousers clean when cycling we have replaced the standard chain by a Carbon belt drive from the leading company for bicycle belt drives : Gates. Magnic Microlights need no cables so this bike follows the no-cables concept (except brake cables) but allows to shift between low and high speed gear with the automatic Sturmey Archer hub.
CLASSIC
The CLASSIC version comes with a standard chain. You can turn the rear while and either us as free-wheel single speed bike or as FIXE with rigid hub.
See more details in the gallery...
6. FASCINATING TECHNOLOGY & PHYSICS
The main technology of our lights is based on eddy current induction.
  PLAY

The core part is the world’s smallest contact- and frictionless bicycle dynamo, that is integrated together with the electronic and the lighting system in the brake shoe of a calliper brake. The world-wide patented technic developed by the German company Magnic Innovations is based on  eddy current induction: a magnetic wheel in a generator separated from the bicycle rim by a narrow air gap induces temporary magnetic fields even in non-magnetic aluminium bicycle rims when the bicycle rim is moving. This leads to the magnetic wheel rotating contactlessly as if by magic.
Neither batteries nor external cables, further fittings or spoke-magnets are necessary. Only the brake shoes have to be exchanged for microlight - brake shoes, so that the maintenance only involves the exchange of worn brake pads after thousands of kilometres. The included brake pads are compatible with other standard brake pads of other manufacturers as available in every cycle shop.
Eddy current
Eddy currents (I, red) induced in a conductive metal plate (C) as it moves to right under a magnet (N)
The key is so-called eddy current technology : Energy is drawn from the rotating bicycle wheels without any physical contact, and thus without friction. Instead, eddy currents, created by strong magnets, generate electricity to power the lights: When the wheel spins, magnets inside the generator induce eddy currents with corresponding magnetic fields in the wheel, which in turn interact with the magnets in the generator. The resulting electricity will power your lights indefinitely without any environmentally harmful batteries or cumbersome cables.
While the previous larger Magnic Lights were equipped with two LEDs (one for stand light) Magnic Microlights have just one LED which is fed by ultra-high efficient Mosfet rectifiers.
7. HOW THE FUTURE CAN BE SMART
The SMART VERSION presented here can only be realized within the rangeof this project if we reach a very high stretch goal of 500.000 €. We don't expect to reach this goal but present what is possible if we do. (In case this amount is reached the reward for the SMART VERSION will be available in the rewards section and you can switch if you like).   
Reason for the high stretch goal: High cost for final development of bluetooth control software & electronics. At the moment we have implemented the main features with prototypes based on the electronic boards and microprocessors of the larger MAGNIC LIGHT IC version.
Turn Signals  
The Smart version comes with a cool novelty : A blink system for turn signals without any additional switches and even without a smartphone. How does it work? If you tap the brake lever the distance between Microlights and rim changes which can be detected in the lights (even without braking). A double-tap is our signal for the blinker: If you double-tap the right brake lever the rear lights detect the signal and via bluetooth to the front lights- so that lights on the right side are blinking. Correspondingly this works on the left side.  
Navigation  
Navigation is similar to the turn signals - but here you are guided and need our Smartphone App for navigation: Lights are controlled by the navigation app and start to blink on the left or right side when you have to turn left/right. Put your smartphone in your bag and let the lights guide your way.  
Speed Data Transmission  
The smart Magnic Microlights are equipped with a Bluetooth LE microcontroller which easily detects the rotation speed of your wheel from the incoming current. Via smartphone or Bluetooth LE compatible speedometer you can receive speed data for display or further processing. This feature replaces Bluetooth LE speed sensors which have the same function but need extra mounting and extra batteries.  
Crash detection with emergency call  
This feature requires some future development and is still theory. In case of a crash generators will stop abruptly. We need some test data but we are confident to be able to detect a crash situation reliably which can be sent to the smartphone in order to make an emergency call.  
Configuraton for Stand light and more  
We will offer different stand light patterns which can be set via Smartphone App. Additionally it will be possible to switch the internal orientation of the lights (for example for correct turn signals if your left and right brake levers deviate from standard installations).
8. HOW WE DO POLITICS: GERMAN STVZO   
Nov. 5th 2018, UPDATE
Concering German STVZO approval for our new lighting technology some frustrating years are behind us. But we did not give up and we achieved that the highest responsable committees were invloved in new rules for STVZO approval concerning our technology. Today we were informed that our main ideas could influence the new legislation which shall pass the Verkehrsauschuss (Committee of Transport) of the German Bundestag next month. We believe that the German rules are too complex and old fashioned and hopefully our efforts help to go in the right direction. For our systems (Magnic Light IC, and Magnic Microlights) this is good news because we finally can adjust our lights concerning to these rules.
For our technology here are the three most important new rules concerning Magnic Light:  
For lighting systems consisting of two separate lights (left & right) the total amount of light needs to exceed the minimum of 10 lux (and not each single light). (Otherwise our lights should have been twice as bright as the required minimum value at 15km/h while they easily do at >25 km/h) 
For lens systems the "brightest area" can replace brightest point of the light distribution (which is the measurement point for the light distribution with respect to "anti-blinding" characteristics). The highest point within such an the "brightest area" can be taken as measurement point now which previously gave room for ambiguity. - 
The German bicycle light lobby wanted to have a new rule that prohibits dynamos with less than 50% efficiency. Sounds reasonable but measurements for "Micro"-system are very complex (and expensive) because the result can be distorted by air resistance, wheel material, bearings, .. much more than these parameters influence large systems (hub dynamos). We could not stop this new rule but at least we could achieve that is is not necessary to prove efficiency charateristics for micro-dynamos below 1,3 Watts. (Background: The rule shall prevent cyclists from exerting too much effort for their dynamo lights- Consequently we should forbid non-aerodynamic clothin for cyclists in future because this costs much more energy ;.) I want to address this to the German Minister for Environment, Svenja Schulze at the Awards Ceromony for the Bundespreis Ecodesign on Nov. 26th in Berlin.
For a "detailed analysis" of the effort you have to pay for Magnic Microlights see the this video below:
9. WHICH FAMOUS CYCLIST AWARDED MAGNIC MICROLIGHTS?
Magnic Microlights win the German Federal Ecodesign Award 2018
On November 26th  Mmagnic Microlights win the German Federal Ecodesign Award 2018 in Berlin.
                                                                 Innovation Award for Magnic Microlights handed over by 5x Tour de France Champion Eddy Merckx
10. MEDIA COVERAGE
In September 2017 a German TV team visited us and made this report (only available in German)Media Coverage German TV Report on Magnic Microlight Prototypes In September a German TV team visited us and made this report (only available in German)  
FEATURED ON ...
                                                                                                                               GEEKY GADGETS
11. OUR BACKGROUND
Cycling is an important part of our live- not just as a business. Below you see images from "The Making of" video & photo material for this project. Whenever we are cycling Magnic Lights & Magnic Microlights are with us (Cycling to Calais, in Berlin, on straw bales ...)
See details in the gallery ...
OUR MISSION
We all just have this one live- why take the risk and cycle without light?
Without lighting, cyclists risk their lives in the dark - but those on the road with battery lights will soon be left in the dark when the journey takes too long or the batteries are no longer full. For those who do not want to mount heavy dynamos, use batteries or lay cables, we've launched two Kickstarter projects with our non-contact Magnic Lights, which feel like battery lighting without having to exchange or change batteries. Magnic Microlights can't be turned off at daylight and we are convinced this makes sense from a safety point of view: With lights on your visibilty increases significantly which means a great deal of safety.
Battery Lights are not the option:
Family team
Dirk Strothmann (Management, CAD & Software Design,...)
Jörn Strothmann (Hardware Tests & Design)
 Antje Strothmann (Photo and video recordings, Shipments)
Lisa Strothmann (Aerial photo and video recordings)
Sarah Strothmann (photo presentation & test driver)
Have a look how and where I am working:
Our partners
Development and production of Magnic Lights strongly depends on our partners. Here you see our most important partners and coworkers:  
VTS Elektronik Gmbh, Fürstenau /GER (Electronic Circuit Design, PCB Board Design & Automated/ Roboter PCB Board Assembly), Coil Winding & Assembly 
HAICHENG MOLD, Shenzhen /CHN Tooing & Injection mold processing
Shenzhen Hill optical technology ,CHN , Lens development & production
12. ILLEGAL COPIES & PLAGIARISM
On the web you can find several illegal copies of our patented technology. 
Patent infringing Magnic Light plagiarism

The sellers don't care for patents and they also fool the customers because their produtcs don't work as promised (and will fail completely after ~30 hours usage because the internal batteries will be empty).
Our original Magnic Lights with real functionality. You can buy them directly in our webshop (Shipment within 2 days)
Watch our analysis of two nasty Magnic Light copies:
13. PAYMENT WITHOUT CREDIT CARD / BEZAHLUNG OHNE KREDITKARTE
Unterstützer aus Deutschland können auch per Lastschrift bezahlen. Finanzierungsbeiträge werden erst bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung nach Ablauf einer Zwei-Wochen Frist abgebucht.
Besteht ein Risiko, wenn das Projektziel nicht erreicht wird?: Nein- Nach Projektende wird der Betrag nur dann eingezogen, wenn das Projektziel erreicht wurde.
14. FAQ
Do Magnic Microlights fit to my bike?
Yes- if you have "Standard" rim brakes (Caliper, Vbrake, Cantilver brakes). Even for disc brake systems we have a clamp adapter solution- but this is just for light and does not provide brake light.
Do Magnic Microlights work with Carbon rims?
No- we need a metal rim. Aluminum is best. Magnesium works, too. 
I want to add mutiple rewards to my pledge. Is this possible?
Yes- This is ok for all available rewards except limited rewards (otherwise the limitation fails)  and complete bicycles (high shipping cost). Just add the amount for additional rewards to your pledge (without additional shipping cost). After project termination you will receive a survey where you can specify your desired combination. 
Do I have to exchange brake pads often?
No- "Normal" cyclists exchange their bicycles more frequently than the brake pads because these usually last for more than 5000 kilometers. Hardcore bikers have to exchange the brake pads from time to time.  

15. PHOTO GALLERIES (FREE FOR MEDIA USAGE)

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With two successful Magnic Light Crowdfunding campaigns we have proven that our technology works as promised and that we are able to handle production and shipment. In the meantime we have received several awards worldwide patent grants for the Magnic Light technology. The last months we worked hard to make the Magnic Microlights ready for production and tested them thoroughly. 

The Smart version will only be available, if we pass the high stretch goal. In contrast to the other rewards the smart version is not ready for production and needs some more development. For this reason delivery of the Smart version will take nearly one year (only in case the stretch goal will be reached).

We have analyzed production steps and risks carefully and don't want to promise more than we can deliver. This means that the majority of the rewards can't be shipped before May 2019.

In the project plan we have taken into account delays due to initial mistakes but it is clear that this is an estimation based on our previous experiences. We will communicate all production steps via Kickstarter updates in detail.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Liebe Microlight & Wega Unterstützer,
In den letzten Wochen konnten wir endlich wichtige Meilensteine abschließen:
Die Überarbeitungen der Kunststoffformen waren erfolgreich (nötig wegen kleinerer Deformationen an wichtigen Teilen) und durch Beimengung von Glaserfaser wurde insbesondere die Stabilität der Verschraubungen deutlich verbessert.

updates.update_userinfo: First Wega sets are on the road
updates.update_content:
Dear Microlight & Wega Backers,
In the last few weeks we were finally able to complete important milestones:
The revisions of the plastic molds were successful (they were necessary because of small deformations) and the stability was significantly improved by the addition of fiberglass.
 The first 20 Wega lamps were made from the final sample material and 2 complete sets were shipped. One Wega set will soon be on a tour through Scandinavia while the other Wega set (two front and two rear lights) is already on tour at the Race Around Germany for more than a week and is subjected to an extreme endurance test (more about this race below).

Liebe Kickstarter Backer,
Gestern bekamen wir die Information, dass die Änderungen an den problematischen Gehäuseteilen nun behoben werden konnten. (Siehe das letzte Update: Die Generatorgehäuse hatten leichte Dellen, die beim Abkühlen des Spritzgussprozesses auftraten.)

Dear Backers,
Yesterday we got the info that the changes in the problematic housing parts have now been fixed. (See the last update: The generator housings had slight dents which occured in the cool down of the injection molding process).

Dear Kickstarter Backers,
After yesterday's update, here I have a short supplementary video of the Wega front light.

Dear Kickstarter Backers,
The last weeks the project made big progress so that we are close to delivery of your lights now. We might even send out a few first Wega lights in February but some small adjustments will improve usability and stability so that we decided to wait the revision and start shipments in March.
For the Microlights the aluminum housings will be finished in March so that we have to start with the Wega version and the Microlights will follow a few weeks later.

updates.update_userinfo: All Injection molds have been finished
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
After many postponements in this strange year, we are now happy that all the injection molds for the Magnic Microlights and Wega lamps could finally be completed at the end of last week. A small preliminary series of injection-molded parts is currently being created, which we expect here over the course of the next week. After our approval, mass production can start in January.

Liebe Unterstützer,
Nach den vielen Verschiebungen in diesem seltsamen Jahr sind wir nun froh, dass endlich alle Spritzgussformen für die Magnic Microlights und Wega Lampen Ende letzter Woche fertiggestellt werden konnten. Mit allen Formen wird aktuell eine kleine Vorab-Serie von Spritzgussteilen erstellt, die wir hier im Laufe der nächsten Woche erwarten. Nach unserer Freigabe, kann dann die Massenfertigung im Januar starten.

Dear Backers,
I was asked for the progress this week and on Thursday I received this production video of the molds for final Wega parts.

Dear Backers,
This week I was asked by some backers for an update from production. This morning our supplier sent us new images and a short video from mold production for the Wega version. They are finishing all molds these days and we hope that this will be possible without bigger problems.
Here you see the mold design for flexible elements for the Wega version

campaign.story:
Why choose Chicso？ Keys are easy to lose. Passwords are easy to forget. Bluetooth locks are easy to hack.  Chicso is the ultimate security solution to make luggage, outdoor, and gym theft a thing of the past. 
The Chicso features an Advanced Fingerprint Sensor with a 0.2 sec unlock time along with an unbreakable design. Chicso provides fast and secure unlocking experience. With IP65 rated waterproof, 360° fingerprint recognition, ultra-long standby time and storage for 40 fingerprints, you need only one finger to keep your belongings safe.
Problems Solved：
No more worry about forgetting your password. 
No need to carry keys or a mobile phone with you. 
No need for multiple steps just to open the lock. 
One touch is all you need to open your secure lock. 
Say goodbye to your old bulky lock and step into the future. Chicso is so small that you can easily keep it in your pocket until you’re ready to keep your stuff protected. Chicso is superior to the simple match-and-unlock mechanism on ordinary locks, as access is only allowed through your unique fingerprint. Great for indoor or outdoor use, and CHICSO is widely used for luggage, golf bags, handbags, school lockers, gym lockers, furniture, wardrobes, bike and anything else that you need secured. 
USD$30,000 UNLOCKED: NEW COLOR - SILVER!
(Color option survey will be distributed via Kickstarter after the campaign ends.)
  Your fingerprint is your key, Chicso is much safer and more convenient, as it’s truly keyless. A smart lock that loyally defends and protects your valuables on all of your journeys. 
Chicso features a 3ft (1m) long retractable wire made from cut-resistant 304 stainless steel, which has a load-bearing capacity of 120kg. The shackle is flexible and incredibly strong which makes it the ideal lock for any situation. As an accessory, widely used for luggage, furniture, wardrobes, bike and anything else.
Chicso, unlike many other intelligent locks on the market, can prevent copycat fingerprints from thieves. This A.I. fingerprint identification solution reads prints in high resolution (508 dpi) and from 360 degrees. 
Chicso knows the difference between a live fingerprint and a picture of a fingerprint and will reject anything that isn’t 100% authentic. Chicso relies on independent A.I. technology to keep user biometric data safe and secure.  
Chicso allows for two administrator fingerprints which enables multi-user management. Up to 40 fingerprints can be registered on the lock so you can share it with friends and family.  
With 100% construction made of aviation grade aluminum alloy, Chicso is ready to handle daily bumps and bruises and can stand up to any tampering by force. 
Chicso’s design is super resistant to prying, slamming, cutting, or anything else that could break weaker locks. Chicso uses an integrated stamping method to create an aluminum alloy, making it ultra-strong and capable of standing up to potential breaking attempts. 
Multispectral recognition systems can read your fingerprint even if it’s wet, oily, dry, or dirty. 
With IP65 dust and water resistance, Chicso can stand up to the elements, meaning that it is excellent for both indoor and outdoor use. 
 Chicso is also resistant to varying temperatures from -20°C-45°C（-4°F-113°F）. Take your Chicso wherever you go without worrying about environmental factors.  
Smart locks need to be reliable, meaning that the battery should work for long periods. Chicso uses a 130mAh built-in battery, and the system is incredibly energy efficient, using only (0.5μm), allowing for one year of regular use (with more than 3,500 unlock/lock actions) or one year of standby on a single charge. Even if the battery dies, Chicso features quick charging technology to get powered up sooner rather than later. 
TEST VEDIO
PLAY

 MEASUREMENT
About Us 
Whenever we used to go out for exercise, fitness, swimming, etc., we would have to bring our traditional keys—this caused a lot of inconvenience. But now, life is much more convenient with a fingerprint sensing lock. It protects our personal belongings and privacy, and with the keys being at our fingertips, opening a lock has never been more convenient. Our designer team did an excellent job on this project.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The CHICSO design is finished, The challenges that are ahead of us as we finalize the development and delivery are related to manufacturing and logistics. Our CEO has over 15 years experience in the related industry. With his guidance we will be prepared for any challenge that may occur.
We have a strong plan for manufacturing in Asia. From our previous experience in designing and product fulfillment. There is always a chance that multiple unexpected setbacks will happen. 
We are already working with top manufacturers in Asia ensure that CHICSO will be made with the highest quality materials and produced in a timely manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello backers, 

Most of our backers have received their Chicso. Some backers have some questions on how to set up their locks. Our team has gathered all the feedbacks from backers. We create a user guide to address backers’ concern.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Process Starts NOW !!! Stay Tuned for More Information (Tracking #)!
updates.update_content:
Thanks for your support throughout this journey. Our team has some good news for all backers. 
This week, we have started the shipping process. All of the CHICSOs would be shipped out by the end of next week. 
More details, such as tracking number will be provided soon. 
Here are some sneak peek of your lovely CHICSO final product. Enjoy !!!

Dear CHICSO backers,
We have some good news for you. Our manufacturers have finished the production this week. The shipping process will begin next week. 
The image below is the packaging and close-up look of your lovely CHICSOs waiting to be shipped.

updates.update_userinfo: Production Update #3: Toward the end of production stage!
updates.update_content:
Hello CHISCO backers, 
It has been two weeks since the last updates. Hope you all doing well. Our team have some good news for our backers. We have worked closely with our manufacturers for the last two weeks. Here are some pictures they provided exclusively for our backers.

Dear CHICSO's backers,
One month has pasted, we have received many comments about the update. Sorry for the delay on the production update. We are currently working closely with our manufacturers to make sure that the production process will be finished by Mar 15. Here are some sneak peaks of CHICSOs in mass production.

updates.update_userinfo: Production Update - Mass Production In Progress
updates.update_content:
Dear CHICSO backers,
Good news! We just got more pictures from the manufacturer and we're happy to share them with you. Everything's working well now. The mass production is still in progress. We are now producing the outer shells.

Dear backers,
It’s been a while to post an update, sorry for the delay. Now we’re glad to share with you some latest news from our manufacturer!
Currently, we've upgraded the battery capacity to 200mAh for you, which means the battery can last for approximately a total 2000+ times of use. Hope you’ll like this free upgrade.

Dear Chicso backers, 
After one month, the funding process has just ended. We got 800% funded, which is far beyond our expectation. We could not thank more to you who love and support our project! 
As promised, we will unlock the new color option for US$30,000 stretch goal. We've sent you the color survey via Kickstarter recently. Please check your inbox and fill it as soon as possible.

Dear backers, 
As the funding continues, now we’ve reached the next milestone, 600% funding! It’s exciting and we really appreciate it. Now there’s only one week left for the funding. Hope you enjoy the campaign so far.
If you love Chicso, please help us to bring it to more people! Join our Kickbooster program, refer your friends and get 10% cash back! Click HERE for more information.

campaign.story:
The first DIY custom molded truly wireless earphones that easily form to the exact shape of your ears. Simply heat the Decibullz thermo-fit earpieces in water and press them into your ears for a perfect fitting earphone that will never fall out or become uncomfortable. Let's face it, earphones are worthless if they don’t stay in your ears. Decibullz earphones stay in your ears no matter what!
                             Easily create perfect fitting custom molded earphones in minutes with our all-new Decibullz Press-Fit System. Simply heat the earpieces in hot water, snap in the earphones and press them into your ear. The earpieces will hold their shape until they are re-heated. The earpieces can be re-molded to make sure you get a perfect fit.
The Black Diamond earphones are the most secure true wireless earphones ever made. We want people to do whatever they choose without having to worry about their earphones falling out or becoming uncomfortable.
Decibullz has a track record of creating some of the best sounding earphones available. Our earphones have been recognized by some of the industry's toughest critics earning two CES Innovation Awards as well as Reviewed.com's Best Earphone of 2015. We are known for our well-balanced sound signature that is clean, powerful, and distortion free.
The Black Diamond earphones feature a digital audio passthrough allowing you to hear external sounds when you want it and shut it out when you don't. Decibullz makes some of the best hearing protection so it's no surprise that our earphones do an amazing job of blocking out external noise.
BLUETOOTH 5.0
The Black Diamond earphones use the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology designed specifically for true wireless audio and data. The means a stronger connection, 2X range, better audio quality, and 2X faster data transfer speeds.
LDS ANTENNA
We have integrated all new LDS antenna technology into the Black Diamond earphones. This new antenna is designed to provide an extremely strong connection while increasing the wireless rage.
The Black Diamond earphones are one of the longest lasting true wireless earphones available. 25 hours of total play time and 5+ hours of continuous music playback. 
Simply remove the earphones from the charging case and pair to your phone. Seriously, that's it! The earphones will then automatically sync to your phone everytime they are removed from the charging case.
It's all about freedom. No more reaching to your device to adjust volume, control your music, make calls, or use voice assistants like Alexa, Siri, or Google. 
We include everything you need to make the best fitting true wireless earphones with ease.
What's In The Box
Decibullz Black Diamond Earphones 
Thermo-fit Custom Earpieces
Press-fit Molding Tool
Custom Silicone Canal Tips S, M, L
USB C Charging Cable
Instructions
Once again we want to thank everyone for their overwhelming support! To show you how much we value our backers we have decided to add an extra set of molds to every Kickstarter earphone for FREE if we reach $200,000!
The absolute best way to keep earphones secure and comfortable is to fit them to the exact shape of your ears. Ears are too diverse for the traditional one-size-fits-all approach.
OUR STORY
Decibullz started out as a weekend project to make an affordable set of custom molded earphones that would not fall out while being active. Decibullz has quickly become the leader in affordable custom earpieces making the best custom-fit earphones, earplugs, and acoustic filters on the market. Put simply, if it goes in your ear we make it better. 
Decibullz is located in Fort Collins Colorado. Our team is dedicated to the pursuit of bringing custom molded earpieces to the masses. 
TRUE WIRELESS DEVELOPMENT
We have been working on a custom molded true wireless earphone for years and Black Diamond has turned into a true passion project for the Decibullz team. We were tired of seeing me-too companies make the same true wireless products without adding any real value. We know that combining our custom molded earpieces with the latest Bluetooth technology would create truly amazing earphones. 
 We have created and tested hundreds of prototypes in our pursuit to create the perfect earphones. 
We scrutinized every aspect of the design, refusing to compromise or rest until everything was perfect.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've done our best to keep the risks and challenges minimal for this project. We are confident we can meet our deadlines with minimal issue. 

As with our two previous successful Kickstarter campaigns, backer communication will be a top priority. As we progress we will post frequent updates. This way backers will know exactly what is happening at each stage of the project. 

We are excited to have our backers join us on this journey!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
HELLO Kickstarters,
After smashing our Kickstarter goal in 2016 with our first HELLO device and getting over 1300% funded, we come back to Kickstarter to present to you 4 new HELLO products to change the way we communicate forever. 
Who are we?  
Who are we? We are Solaborate - an end-to-end encrypted communication and collaboration company. We believe that simplifying communication tools and service represents our greatest opportunity to improve people's lives. 
With the unbelievable support of a community of 900+ people from 60 countries all over the worlds, and shipping 100% of HELLO Communication devices to all our backers last year, we're incredibly excited to present to you HELLO 2 and four new HELLO products:   
Introducing: 
1. HELLO 2  
2. HELLO Touch TV + Whiteboarding  
3. HELLO Creator Edition
4. HELLO Controller
HELLO 2 - The World's Most Powerful Communication Device 
HELLO 2 is designed together with our community to address some of the most annoying video and audio communication issues we face today.
With significantly improved hardware and software, the second generation HELLO 2 transforms any TV into the world’s most powerful communication device for video conferencing, digital whiteboarding, wireless screen sharing, Alexa and Google Voice Assistant, TV streaming, gaming, live broadcasting, camera feed with motion and voice detection + infrared night vision, and more.
The HELLO Solaborate Messenger platform has been in the making for more than 6 years. With tight integration across our devices and mobile/PC platforms, we aim to make collaboration seamless. HELLO Messenger can be easily accessed via your Android, iOS, Web and Desktop Clients. 
HELLO 2 will also support the best video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Meet, Zoom, Cisco WebEx, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, BlueJeans, Polycom RealPresence, Fuze, Unify, and more.
HELLO Touch - Real time Video Conferencing & Whiteboarding
 Powered by HELLO 2, the 65-inch HELLO Touch is the smartest and most affordable 4K Touch TV with 10 multi-touch points for real-time collaboration, digital whiteboarding, video conferencing, wireless sharing, and more.  

The primary function of HELLO Touch is to serve as a digital whiteboard with tight video and audio ingratiation so that your virtual teams in other physical locations can collaborate in real-time from any device without limitations.


The possibilities of HELLO Touch and Whiteboarding are virtually endless. 
HELLO Creator Edition
HELLO Creator Edition comes in a transparent casing, letting you see the inner workings of the device, which reflects our open source ideology in a physical aspect. If you didn’t get the hint already, we are now opening our platform for developers to build any hardware gadget extensions or software applications on top of our open platform.
This version of HELLO is designed and built specifically with the developer community in mind and we cannot wait to see what developers from all over the world will build on top of our platform.
HELLO Gadget Extensions
HELLO Gadget Extensions are a collection of connected products that enhance communication and interactions with HELLO devices. We built HELLO Button and Controller as an example to show you how easy it is to extend the HELLO capabilities, and we can’t wait to see what kind of gadgets you will create next.


HELLO Controller
The HELLO Controller  is a new way to play games through your HELLO device from the comfort of your couch anytime you need a break from work, or simply want to enjoy your time with family and friends.

Since you can now install any Android game of your choice on HELLO 2, our slick, super-responsive controller will allow you to play any game. A software version of the HELLO Controller which will make it easier to play games from your mobile phone will also be available on our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app.

The Making of HELLO 2 
Having learned a lot from the HELLO 1 experience and your feedback, making HELLO 2 in a sense was much easier. However we’ve spent much more work on ensuring that our passion for beautiful hardware and software is translated into a reliable and manufacturable device.
Hardware and software quality testing, reliability testing and manufacturing setup have been our go to words all along this project and we feel proud and ready to share our work and love with you.
HELLO 2 Features

Secure, sleek and feature-packed, HELLO 2 brings a whole range of new possibilities to life and is the ultimate all-in-one communication device for your home and office.  

It comes with built-in speakers, infrared night vision, Zigbee for home automation, NFC, hardware-based privacy buttons and 152-degree FOV coverage with automatic tilting. 

Video & Audio Calls
Crystal Clear Audio and Video Calls  
From sharing family moments to business meetings, HELLO 2 aims to make your life easier via communications. Need to make unlimited one on one or group audio and video calls for free whenever you need to stay in touch with your family and friends? With HELLO, they’re just a call away!

Tired of having to spend the first 10-15 minutes of every online meeting trying to properly establish the call or making sure you hear each-other? HELLO completely eliminates this problem by offering you crystal clear unlimited audio and video conference calls for free, anytime you need to have an online meeting with your remote teams, clients, or even potential customers.  

HELLO 2 is equipped with powerful hardware, with a 4K HDR sensor, an array of 4 beamforming microphones for noise cancellation, makes sure to pick up sounds and your expressions from a distance 8m+, even in the most challenging environments. To start an instant video or audio call, use our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or any other app of your choice.


Use Your Favorite Voice Assistant
  We love our phones, but sometimes, after a long busy day, they are a drag. That is why we integrated the magic of Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant into the HELLO 2 - to always answer your questions and commands.  

Listen to your favorite playlists, make audio and video calls, send and receive messages, get weather and forecast information, find out sports scores, order food, and more — in real time!
Alexa Voice Assistant
Interact with your favorite voice assistant productively and let it integrate with your routine to help you get things done! Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant are able to learn from your behavior and be there for you whenever you need them to.
Google Assistant
Seamless Home Automation
HELLO 2 has full integration and support with Alexa and Google Assistant for full home automation compatibility.

Create your personal area network for home automation with Zigbee which can be easily installed in your home with no need for additional cables.
Wireless Screencasting
With HELLO 2 it's super easy to share and cast any content in real time from your phone or laptop while you are near the TV or away from it. Share an experience, a presentation, a picture or a funny video with everyone in the room.

  Wireless Screen Sharing
  In a hectic world like ours, it is always smart to be as much productive and efficient as you can. Want to share something interesting with your team or simply make a presentation without any wires.

Gaming & TV Streaming
Switch to your favorite TV Mode - be it Gaming or TV Streaming, whenever you feel like playing video games or watching movies with your family and friends.

HELLO Gaming
We all know the best bonding memories with your family and friends happen when you play games and have fun in each other’s company. HELLO brings that fun back to the big screen in your living room or office. Just switch to Gaming Mode and play any Android game you want, even when you are at work and need a refreshing short break.

HELLO TV Streaming
 The TV Streaming mode will allow you to only see streaming apps on your Home Screen. Watch TV through any Android app you have installed on your HELLO to follow your favorite series or movies using Netflix, Youtube, HBO NOW, KODI or other TV streaming providers.  

No need for extra cables or boxes. All you have to do is find time to catch up with the latest episodes, sit back, and enjoy.

  Collaboration Mode 
Collaboration Mode allows you to link your Google or Office 365 Calendars and start meetings directly from your HELLO, with just one click. Whether the meeting was scheduled in Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom or other communication apps, HELLO will open them and your meeting will be ready to start. 

HELLO Rooms Controller
Never second guess a room’s schedule. HELLO Rooms Controller app is designed to start a meeting with one click. It supports both HELLO video app and third-party video apps. Its has built in integration with Google and Office 365 calendar so that scheduling and meeting is super simple. It also has SIP Phone dial-in and out including interoperability between SIP clients. You do not own a Touch TV ? No Problem, HELLO Rooms Controller will allow you to cast your touch input to any TV. 


Camera Feed With Motion Detection and Night Vision 
Easily check on your home, kids, or pets – when out and away. And if any unusual activities may occur — when uninvited friends come by or even Santa dropping by — motion-activated notifications will pop on your phone, offering you an excellent and secure connection with your home, when needed.

The Camera Feed of HELLO 2 is packed with motion detection as well as infrared night vision features which offer you full power and let you know whenever something moves in front of your HELLO at home or even office so you will be alerted at all times and take the necessary measures, even when it’s dark.
Install any Android Apps 
HELLO 2 comes with numerous pre-installed apps such as Skype, Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, Amazon Chime, Google Hangouts Meet, GoToMeeting, BlueJeans, WebEx and more.  

HELLO 2 Integration with Microsoft Teams 

Besides pre-installed apps, you’ll be able to install any apps of YOUR choice. Grab the freedom to personalize your HELLO and bring all your favorite apps in one place.

  Easy Setup and Control

HELLO 2 is lightweight, compact, and easy to set up. Simply unbox it, plug in the power adapter and connect the HELLO device to any TV via an HDMI cable. Download the HELLO Solaborate Messenger app to scan your unique QR code and you’re good to go within two minutes!
To assure you have the best possible experience, you have the option to control the device through its hardware air mouse remote control that comes with it inside the box, or through the remote app for both Android and iOS. Just pick your favorite!
Automatic Tilting
To ensure full-view for professional-quality video HELLO 2 offers automatic tilting. Adjust the tilting remotely through our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or by simply touching the ring around the HELLO 2 camera.

Automatic Tilting - View from the HELLO 2 
                                       Crafted from 6000 Series Aluminium & High-Quality plastics/silicone, HELLO 2 offers reliable durability combined with elegance to best fit any home or office.
With HELLO Creator Edition we're showing the inner workings of HELLO 2, both physical and software so we can feed our engineering spirit and build what we love together. Transparent. Open. Beautiful.
Built-in Hack-Proof Video and Audio Controls for Ultimate Privacy
  We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right and that’s why we engineered HELLO 2 with two built-in hack-proof privacy controls and end-to-end encryption for everyone’s protection and peace of mind. Unless hackers come to your office or home in person, there is no way for them to access the audio and video of your HELLO 2 when you’ve deactivated them with the privacy buttons. When you activate them, the microphone and camera lines are physically cut from the system (going into the SoC). Therefore software cannot control them.


Near Field Communication (NFC)
NFC will allow you to easily jump into a whiteboarding session or video conferencing room, and share content or files of your choice through the HELLO 2 by simply bringing your phone close to the device.  

When you join any office meeting room that uses HELLO 2, you can be set up and ready to go with a personalized experience in a matter of seconds!

Dual Screen Support 
The new dual-screen feature allows you to connect HELLO 2 with two TVs at the same time so that you can use two different features on two separate TVs. If you need to use Whiteboarding and Video calling, Screen Sharing and Video Calling, and so on at the same time, you can use the dual-screen support to fully use whiteboarding on one TV, and fully see the video call feed on the other.

Product Timeline
Stay Tuned with US
Thank you so much for your continuous support! To keep up with the latest updates on HELLO, follow us on our social media channels:
Meet HELLO Team
 The hard work and dedication of our HELLO Team has been truly unbelievable these past few years and creating the next-generation of HELLO and 4 other innovative HELLO products, has been our greatest achievement!    

These top-of-the-line HELLO products have not only helped us increase productivity internally white building HELLO products and apps, but have helped an immense amount of people and teams all over the world increase their efficiency and improve their work-life balance as well.  

But we couldn’t be here without you so we cannot thank you enough for all your help and constant support!

Pick up your favorite Reward
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks are very low as we’ve done this before and learned so much with you in our first and very successful Kickstarter campaign for HELLO I. We delivered 100% of HELLO devices and have offered and continue to offer 24/7 support to all our backers. Having learned from our prior experience we started work on HELLO 2 early on and made sure we passed all the development stages and we are ready for mass production.
This time we are counting on a bigger team which has grown from 47 people to over 80 during the past year.

We’ve been working very hard to address all your feedback and innovate on top of it. We’ve poured all our effort to bring this device to life, and we’re confident that all our backers will love our HELLO products as much as we do. 

As with any product designed for mass production, manufacturing HELLO 2, HELLO Touch TV, HELLO Creator Edition, HELLO Button, and HELLO Controller requires injection molding, equipment setup, and certifications that will demand additional costs and development time. Your pledges will help getting around some of these costs. As a ticket of appreciation and early-on help, when it’s most needed, we’ll ensure that you as a HELLO backer, not only will receive the product(s) you pledge in a timely manner, but also have access to lifetime use of all the features we offer.
Our development team has already started working on delivering all new HELLO products, and unless confronted with an issue beyond human control, we will deliver the products to you with the highest possible quality.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: HELLO Solaborate to showcase new HELLO 2 products at InfoComm 2019
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!
We just wanted to give you a little update and let you know that we will once again attend InfoComm — the largest event in North America focused on the pro-AV industry. This year at InfoComm, besides HELLO 2 and HELLO Touch products, we will also showcase the next-generation of all-in-one HELLO 2 plus AI based on Qualcomm Snapdragon chipset.

updates.update_userinfo: HELLO 2 devices are on your way!
updates.update_content:
HELLO Backers,  
We are happy to share some very good news with all of you, so here we go: 
Your HELLO 2 devices are on your way! We have already shipped all your orders and sent your tracking number via email. In case you haven’t confirmed your shipping address yet, please fill out the survey that we sent you here on Kickstarter so we can ship your order immediately.

updates.update_userinfo: Great news: Shipping process has started!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,  
We have great news! As of today, we are starting the shipping process and we cannot wait for you to receive the HELLO 2 products you have ordered. We are working hard to get all the devices to you, so as soon as we ship your order we will send you the tracking number via email. Keep an eye on your email.

updates.update_userinfo: HELLO 2 Mass-Production is done and we are ready to ship!
updates.update_content:
HELLO backers,  
We are really sorry for the delay so far, but we are making sure that the quality of all our HELLO 2 products remains our top priority. Our team is working hard to get all HELLO 2 devices to you ASAP and we are happy to announce that the mass-production process is done! We are currently working on shipping logistics with our manufacturer in China to get HELLO 2 ready for shipping.

updates.update_userinfo: HELLO 2 Mass-Production Begins, Shipping to Start Soon!
updates.update_content:
2019 is here and we have some great news everyone!!
In October we were well underway with our certification program for HELLO 2 products and finished producing the first PVT (170pc pre-production units), a major milestone in ensuring we deliver a good product, in a timely manner.

Lots of things have happened since then!

Our engineering team is continuing to work super hard with our hardware components and manufacturing vendors and we are happy to announce that the production of all our HELLO 2 products is going pretty well. We have already started the mass-production and we are going to start shipping your orders very soon! We’ve also got 3 certifications:

updates.update_userinfo: Tune in to our Live Demo on YouTube!
updates.update_content:
HELLO there!  
Want to know more about our brand new HELLO 2 products we just launched on IndieGoGo and ask us any questions live? You will have your chance to do so if you TUNE IN to our Live Demo on Youtube on December 19th at 10 AM PST to see all HELLO 2 products in action!  
Our previous Live Demo on Kickstarter got a lot of attention and we had so much fun talking with all the viewers in real time and answering all their questions. Now we’ll be back to have an even more successful LIVE DEMO of HELLO 2, HELLO Touch TV, and HELLO Creator Edition.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank You HELLO 2 Backers! Our Kickstarter campaign is officially over. What lies ahead?
updates.update_content:
We made it! Not only did we reach our Kickstarter goal but we managed to reach over $430K (1400%+ funded). But this all wouldn’t have been possible without your help and the continuous support of our 622 lovely backers, so thank you for believing in us!
Whether you helped us by backing our campaign and picking your favorite reward, or by sharing and spreading the word out there, thanks to YOU, we made it!  
What comes next?
